languages.text: "Мы будем думать о неудержимости и упоении. О том, что пронзает и поглощает. Может, так мы поймем?"
"We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"
languages.original_text: "Мы будем думать о неудержимости и упоении. О том, что пронзает и поглощает. Может, так мы поймем?"

traits.locale_text: "We will think about the irrepressible rapture. On what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think on irrepressible rapture. On what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think about the irrepressible rapture. On what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think about the irrepressible rapture. On what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"

languages.text: « Nous allons réfléchir à cette volupté irrépressible, à ce qui transperce et consume... Peut-être cela nous permettra-t-il de comprendre ? »
languages.original_text: "We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons réfléchir à cette volupté irrépressible, à ce qui transperce et consume... Peut-être cela nous permettra-t-il de comprendre ? »

languages.text: “我们会好好思索刺穿、吞没，以及无法抑制的愉悦。或许我们以后会理解吧？”
languages.original_text: "We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: “我们会好好思索刺穿、吞没，以及无法抑制的愉悦。或许我们以后会理解吧？”

languages.text: "Wir werden über die nicht zu unterdrückende Entrückung nachdenken. Darüber, was durchbohrt und verschlingt. Vielleicht verstehen wir es dann?"
languages.original_text: "We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden über die nicht zu unterdrückende Entrückung nachdenken. Darüber, was durchbohrt und verschlingt. Vielleicht verstehen wir es dann?"

languages.text: «Pensaremos sobre la incontenible euforia. Sobre lo que perfora y consume. Quizá así logremos entenderlo».
languages.original_text: "We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: «Pensaremos sobre la incontenible euforia. Sobre lo que perfora y consume. Quizá así logremos entenderlo».

languages.text: 「私たちは抑えがたい歓喜について考える。何が貫き、何を飲み込むのかを。そうすれば、いつかは理解できるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは抑えがたい歓喜について考える。何が貫き、何を飲み込むのかを。そうすれば、いつかは理解できるだろうか？」

languages.text: "Önlenemez, delen ve tüketen coşkuyu düşüneceğiz. Belki o zaman anlarız."
languages.original_text: "We will think about the irrepressible rapture. About what pierces and consumes. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: "Önlenemez coşkuyu düşüneceğiz. Delen ve tüketeni... Belki o zaman anlarız."
